section.title: Volume Problem
section.para: Steve Roso
historically looked at peak flows, now we need to look at levels or volumes
our urban drainage solutions have shifted from conveyance solution to a storage solution. methods have not kept up.
practitioners need to use methods that are compatible with the solutions they are proposing.
this problem is exacerbated by the additional volumes created by urbanisation
the shift from conveyance solutions (pipes and channels) to storage solutions which older methods aren't equipped for.
